cast.name: 卡罗琳娜·科佩利奥夫 Carolina Kopelioff

this_title: La noche que luché contra Dios
introduction: On July 18, 1994, young Benjamín Sheinberg begins his first day as a resident doctor at the Hospital de Clínicas, in Buenos Aires, while at the same time a bomb explodes at the AMIA, causing the death of 85 people. Sheinberg is overwhelmed by the situation that affects him beyond his professional level and decides to go to Israel. There, with the help of Rubén, an old friend of his grandfather, he will “travel” in time, entering the ancient history of Israel, seeing himself reflected in the ancient character Jacob. But what connection is there between both characters?
chinese_title: La noche que luché contra Dios
